text:
[Verse]
City lights are shining bright
Dancing through the night
Skyscrapers touch the sky
Neon glow we'll fly

[Verse 2]
Cars rush by in streams
Echoes of our dreams
Footsteps on the street
Rhythm of the beat

[Chorus]
Under city lights we roam
Everywhere we feel at home
In the night we come alive
City's heartbeat makes us thrive

[Verse 3]
Stores with windows dressed
Rain on sidewalks blessed
Music in the air
Freedom everywhere

[Chorus]
Under city lights we roam
Everywhere we feel at home
In the night we come alive
City's heartbeat makes us thrive

[Bridge]
Lost and found with every turn
In the glow our spirits burn
Every moment feels so right
Magic in the city night
title: City Lights
